body:
$SPY $DJIA $QQQ $AAPL $TSLA  
 
Man, if the FEDs continue to support this bull market with unlimited liquidity newbie traders are never gonna get the chance to employ one of the best amateur strategies out there. The "buy high, sell low" strategy. 
 
Instead of "buy high, sell low" most newbies these days employ a more sophisticated strategy of "buy high, add lower, sell higher". 
 
In some ways I feel sorry for newbies who never got to experience a true, two-sided, risk-adjusted financial market. They truly miss out on some of the best lessons free market capitalism has to offer!

$AAPL picked up 177.5 calls but some puts to hedge just incase 

$ROKU 177.5 calls already up 70% 

Going to be a fun Tuesday Let’s get this bread
$RBLX Short squeeze+ RBLX Montly Report= $120 PT Next week. Book it. $NFLX $TLSA $AAPL $FB

$AAPL  
 
AAPL Happy Friday everyone! bit of a mixed trading week, markets were a bit jittery. Looking for a solid week after MLK day - we will see what happens. body:
$SPY ps...  pretty much everything I said in this video (and the one linked below it) is still relevant.. 

Again...  above 474 (SPY) and bulls celebrate: below that and things get bloody red... 

$TSLA $NVDA $AAPL etc will all be affected.  

Maybe sit on the sidelines and play stuff like $SBEV until the dust settled (<<<I also called this move btw 🤷‍♂️) 

I can't hammer home this point more clearly.  

ABOVE 474 on SPY is bullish...BELOW 474 IS VERY, VERY BAD FOR THE MARKETS IN GENERAL. 

Don't shoot the messenger 👀

https://youtu.be/vYumq5Wu4YA

body: $LCID 👇🏽🔥🚀 Louisiana State Employees Retirement System Buys Lucid Group Inc, $LCID @LucidMotors top holding for Louisiana state employees system are $AAPL $TSLA $MSFT Amazon, Facebook and others

The industry average ROA is 5.50%. $AAPL outperforms 97% of its industry peers. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/analyzer/stock/AAPL?view=fundamental-analysis&key=bb853040-a4ac-41c6-b549-d218d2f21b32&utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=FA&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking

$SPY that close wasn't bullish...  I hate to say it, but the mostly likely scenario is a gap down over the weekend.  

If we continue up, there are multiple reasons to think the "bounce" will be short-lived. 

Above 474 (on SPY) and I'm a "bull" again.  Anything below this area and I'm still leaning toward red days ahead.  

Don't shoot the messenger 🤷‍♂️

$aapl $tsla $BTC.X and pretty much the entire S&P is in trouble.  Go look at the $HD chart if you wanna' see trajectory.  

Again...  the pivot (on SPY) is in that 474 area.  Above it's a long, below it's a bloody short 🤢
$AAPL Straying from my usual MO but past experience tells me there’s gonna be a bounce next week 🦘💰🤷🏻‍♀️

body: $AAPL NEW ARTICLE : Buckle Up: December Retail Sales Miss Is Worse Than It Appears https://www.stck.pro/news/AAPL/21327013

$AAPL 

Crowned The Maker of The Apple Car
Could Lucid Possible Land the Apple automotive Contract

Will Apple and Lucid Team up to create an Apple Car?
Lucid Motors and Apple have been long rumored to partner up in the future.If this is indeed the case then we could see an enormous increase in Lucids stock price.A partnership with LC,as one of the leaders in the Electric Vehicle race.

Apple has just announced that they will be choosing who will make the Apple car in late 2022.This news caused a rumble in the Electric Vehicle space as many companies will be trying to win this once in a lifetime opportunity to create an Apple car.Apple had the opportunity to buy Tesla for around $60B.When Elon Musk,before Tesla almost had to declare bankruptcy.
Why Lucid?
Lucid Motors has prided themselves with having the best battery technology in the Electric Vehicle industry.Peter Rawlinson has also been foreshadowing a future Lucid x Apple Partnership.

https://www.torquenews.com/16714/will-apple-and-lucid-team-create-apple-car
